trans-unit.source: Represents a file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 表示不应搜索要添加到 Web 服务发现文档的引用文件系统目录路径。

trans-unit.source: The ExcludePathInfo class is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 通过采用 ExcludePathInfo 类，则<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>类的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法，处理发现文档的 HTTP 请求。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> property contains a collection of ExcludePathInfo instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument>类的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A>属性包含 ExcludePathInfo 实例集合。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，这些类都需要由开发人员直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo"></xref> class and specifies the file system path to exclude from searches.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo"></xref>类，并指定要从搜索中排除的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `path` parameter becomes the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值`path`参数将成为的返回值<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo.Path%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path to exclude from searches.
trans-unit.target: 要从搜索中排除的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应不会搜索要添加到发现文档的引用的文件系统目录路径。

trans-unit.source: The file system directory path that should be excluded from searches.
trans-unit.target: 应从搜索中排除的文件系统目录路径。
